EMAC_FxnTable_s Struct Reference

The definition of a EMAC function table that contains the required set of functions to control a specific EMAC driver implementation. More...

#include <emac_drv.h>

Detailed Description

The definition of a EMAC function table that contains the required set of functions to control a specific EMAC driver implementation.

Field Documentation

EMAC_CloseFxn EMAC_FxnTable_s::closeFxn

Function to close the specified peripheral

EMAC_ConfigFxn EMAC_FxnTable_s::configFxn

Function to config the specified EMAC port for RX filtering, multicast addresses

EMAC_GetStatsFxn EMAC_FxnTable_s::getStatsFxn

Function to get EMAC port statistics

EMAC_GetStatsIcssgFxn EMAC_FxnTable_s::getStatsIcssgFxn

Function to get EMAC ICSSG port statistics, only supportf for am65xx SOC

EMAC_IoctlFxn EMAC_FxnTable_s::ioctlFxn

Function to send IOCTL command for specified port, only supportf for am65xx SOC

EMAC_OpenFxn EMAC_FxnTable_s::openFxn

Function to open the specified EMAC port

EMAC_PollCtrlFxn EMAC_FxnTable_s::pollCtrl

Function to Poll the driver for specified flow/rings, only supportf for am65xx SOC

EMAC_PollFxn EMAC_FxnTable_s::pollFxn

Function to poll link status for specified EMAC port

EMAC_PollPktFxn EMAC_FxnTable_s::pollPktFxn

Function to poll for receive packets specified EMAC port

EMAC_SendFxn EMAC_FxnTable_s::sendFxn

Function to send packet to network on specified EMAC port
